issue.title: [C++] Range data comparison for struct type may go out of bounds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17964](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17964). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When the struct-typed items being compared do not have the same length as the struct, an index-access to child data may go out of bounds.
